## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G24590](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G24590)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ANAC091, ANAC91, NAC091, TIP</u>
- **Gene Name:** Arabidopsis NAC domain containing protein 91, TCV-interacting protein
- **Description:**   TCV-interacting protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2153899
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
